name: emojitwo
description: Emojis in SVG and PNG format based upon Emojione. Emojitwo is a complete set of emojis (as of Unicode 9.0, Emoji 4.0) designed for the web.

suggest.emojione/assets: More up-to-date emoji set with a more restrictive license and without SVGs.
suggest.emojione/emojione: A set of libraries to make using emoji on your websites easier.
suggest.twemoji: Alternate set of AI/SVG/PNG emoji graphics, including a JS library A Unicode standard based way to implement emoji across all platforms.
suggest.google/noto-emoji: Alternate set of AI/SVG/PNG emoji graphics, including a JS library.
suggest.twitter/twemoji: Alternate set of AI/SVG/PNG emoji graphics, including a JS library.
